title: Napier, New Zealand
summary: Napier (/ˈneɪpiər/ NAY-pee-ər; Māori: Ahuriri) is a New Zealand beachside city with a seaport, located in Hawke's Bay on the eastern coast of the North Island. Known for its warm Mediterranean climate, esplanade lined with Norfolk Pines and extensive Art Deco architecture, Napier is often revered as the "Nice of the Pacific".[2]
